summary:
Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is an American company that designs and sells computer processors. They make chips for computers, servers, and gaming consoles. Founded in 1969, AMD started with memory chips and later entered the microprocessor market to compete with Intel.

After some ups and downs, AMD gained popularity again in the late 2010s with its Ryzen processors. These chips offered great performance at a lower cost, helping AMD win back market share. They also expanded into new areas like data centers and gaming.
title: AMD
